=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|鴛鴦り夫婦|おしどり ふうふ}}: literally "couple of ducks", loving couple, couple of lovebirds, happily married couple
* {{ja-r|夫婦気取り|ふうふ きどり}}: literally "assume airs of a married couple", behaving as if they were a married couple
* {{ja-r|夫婦の縁を結ぶ|ふうふ の えん を むすぶ}}: literally "tie the bonds of husband and wife", get married
* {{ja-r|夫婦の仲を裂く|ふうふ の なか を さく}}: literally "split the relationship of husband and wife", bring about marital separation
{{der-bottom}}
